alien4cloud.rest.component

Class ComponentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • alien4cloud.rest.component.ComponentController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value={"/rest/components","/rest/v1/components","/rest/latest/components"})
public class ComponentController
extends Object
    Handle components

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id:.+}",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.types.AbstractToscaType> getComponent(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              QueryComponentType toscaType)
        Get details for a component.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id of the component for which to get details.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains an AbstractToscaType .

      • getComponent

        @RequestMapping(value="/element/{elementId:.+}/version/{version:.+}",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.types.AbstractToscaType> getComponent(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String elementId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String version,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  QueryComponentType toscaType)
        Get details for a component based on it's name and version.
        Parameters:
        elementId - unique id of the component for which to get details.
        version - unique id of the component for which to get details.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains an AbstractToscaType .

      • getComponentVersions

        @RequestMapping(value="/element/{elementId:.+}/versions",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<CatalogVersionResult[]> getComponentVersions(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String elementId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 QueryComponentType toscaType)
        Get all versions of a given component.
        Parameters:
        elementId - unique id of the component for which to get all other versions.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains an AbstractToscaType .

      • checkElementExist

        @RequestMapping(value="/exist",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Boolean> checkElementExist(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ElementFromArchiveRequest checkElementExistRequest)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         throws ClassNotFoundException
        Check if an element exist in alien repository
        Parameters:
        checkElementExistRequest - request
        Returns:
        A rest response that contains true if the element has been found in Alien repository, and false if not.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if the class of element is not available on server

      • search

        @RequestMapping(value="/search",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.dao.model.FacetedSearchResult<? extends org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.types.AbstractToscaType>> search(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ComponentSearchRequest searchRequest)
        Search for TOSCA elements.
        Parameters:
        searchRequest - The search request.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains a FacetedSearchResult of NodeType.

      • getRecommendedForCapability

        @RequestMapping(value="/recommendation/{capability:.+}",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\', \'COMPONENTS_BROWSER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.types.NodeType> getRecommendedForCapability(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           String capability)
        Get the component recommended as default for a capability
        Parameters:
        capability -
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains an NodeType .

      • recommendComponentForCapability

        @RequestMapping(value="/recommendation",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.types.NodeType> recommendComponentForCapability(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  RecommendationRequest recommendationRequest)
        define a component as default recommended for a specific capability. Only one component can be recommended as default for a capability.
        Parameters:
        recommendationRequest - : RecommendationRequest object mapping the request body of the REST call.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains the component NodeType that has just been recommended.

      • unflagAsDefaultForCapability

        @RequestMapping(value="/unflag",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.types.NodeType> unflagAsDefaultForCapability(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       RecommendationRequest recommendationRequest)
        un-define a component as default recommended for a specific capability.
        Parameters:
        recommendationRequest - : RecommendationRequest object mapping the request body of the REST call.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains the component NodeType that has just been undefined as default.

      • upsertTag

        @RequestMapping(value="/{componentId:.+}/tags",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> upsertTag(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String componentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             UpdateTagRequest updateTagRequest)
        Update or insert one tag for a given component
        Parameters:
        componentId - The if of the component for which to insert a tag.
        updateTagRequest - The request that contains the key and value for the tag to update.
        Returns:
        a void rest response that contains no data if successful and an error if something goes wrong.

      • deleteTag

        @RequestMapping(value="/{componentId:.+}/tags/{tagId}",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'COMPONENTS_MANAGER\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> deleteTag(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String componentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String tagId)
